title: Guadalupe Mountains National Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit        Majestic and powerful relative to the flat earth below, El Capitan is viewable from the Guadalupe Peak trail. NPS Photo - Adam Butterick   Â       Whether you are only stopping in for a few hours, or planning on spending a week in the park, find all of the information you will need to plan your visit at Guadalupe Mountains.   Build Your Itinerary  Basic Information: find our hours, fees, weather, etc.   Directions and Transportation: find how to get around and get to Guadalupe Mountains.   Eating & Sleeping: find information on camping and nearby lodging   Things To Do: find all of the resources you need to plan your day hikes, backpacking trips, and download guides before you visit.   Don't forget to check out the park calendar to learn about upcoming ranger programs, special events, and other activities.
